item.description: This items displays rolling credits, ie. a list of members of the software team. This list is taken from a custom file.

field.name: rolling_credits.credits
field.description: The path to the credits file.

field.name: rolling_credits.movement_duration
field.description: The duration in seconds of the movement of the lines.

field.name: rolling_credits.fading_duration
field.description: The duration in seconds of the fading effect when a line appears or disappears.
